title: 04/14/2021 - HOUR 1 - Niners, Nets, Falcons
itunes:title: 04/14/2021 - HOUR 1 - Niners, Nets, Falcons
description:
You can tell the Niners believe in their system

The Nets defense isn't good enough to win a title

The Falcons are giving the illusion of interest


Guest: Nick Wright
